Table 4 Structural and magnetic data for out-of-plane mono-μ-chloro-bridged copper(II) chains
Compounda J/cm−1 φ b/° α c/° β d/° Cu–Clax/Å Cu⋯Cu/Å φ/(Cu–Cl) Ref.
a dmso = dimethyl sulfoxide; imH = imidazole; pepci = N-(2-pyridylethyl)pyridine-2-carbaldimine; bipy = 2,2′-bipyridine; caf = caffeine; paphy = pyridine-2-carboxaldehyde-2-pyridylhydrazone; maep = 2-(2-methylaminoethyl)pyridine. b Cu–Cl(bridge)–Cu bond angle. c trans L–Cu–Cl(bridge) bond angle. d trans L–Cu–Cl(terminal) or trans N–Cu–N bond angle.

Table 4. Structural and magnetic data for out-of-plane mono-μ-chloro-bridged copper(II) chains

| Compound[^a] | J/cm⁻¹ | φ[^b]/° | α[^c]/° | β[^d]/° | Cu–Clₐₓ/Å | Cu⋯Cu/Å | φ/(Cu–Cl) | Ref. |
|--------------|--------|---------|---------|---------|-----------|---------|-----------|------|
| [Cu(dmso)₂Cl₂]ₙ | -12.2 | 144.6 | 146.1 | 173.0 | 2.70 | 4.76 | 53.6 | 6a–c |
| [Cu(imH)₂Cl₂]ₙ | -4.2 | 117.0 | 166.9 | 174.3 | 2.75 | 4.37 | 42.5 | 6c–e |
| [Cu(pepci)Cl]ₙ(PF₆)ₙ | -2.8 | 137 | 156.6 | 170.3 | 2.83 | 4.75 | 48.4 | 6l |
| [Cu(bipy)Cl₂]ₙ | -2.3 | 107.5 | 158.5 | 171.5 | 2.67 | 4.01 | 40.3 | 6h |
| [Cu(caf)(H₂O)Cl₂]ₙ | +1.0 | 128.1 | 178.8 | 161.0 | 2.79 | 4.60 | 45.9 | 6c,f |
| [Cu(paphy)Cl]ₙ(PF₆)ₙ·nH₂O | +1.3 | 102.0 | 167.6 | 160.1 | 2.81 | 3.92 | 36.3 | 6n |
| [Cu(maep)Cl₂]ₙ | +3.2 | 113.6 | 176.0 | 165.7 | 2.79 | 4.26 | 40.7 | 6c,g |
| [Cu₂(dpp)₂Cl₄]ₙ | +6.8 | 98.5 | 154.6 | 170.7 | 2.56 | 3.69 | 38.5 | This work |
[^a]: dmso = dimethyl sulfoxide; imH = imidazole; pepci = N-(2-pyridylethyl)pyridine-2-carbaldimine; bipy = 2,2′-bipyridine; caf = caffeine; paphy = pyridine-2-carboxaldehyde-2-pyridylhydrazone; maep = 2-(2-methylaminoethyl)pyridine.
[^b]: Cu–Cl(bridge)–Cu bond angle.
[^c]: trans L–Cu–Cl(bridge) bond angle.
[^d]: trans L–Cu–Cl(terminal) or trans N–Cu–N bond angle.

cln_elements.content:
Table 5 Structural and magnetic data for out-of-plane di-μ-chloro-bridged copper(II) dinuclear units
Compounda J/cm−1 φ b/° α c/° β d/° Cu–Clax/Å Cu⋯Cu/Å φ/(Cu–Cl) Ref.
a tmso = tetramethylene sulfoxide; 2-MePy = 2-methylpyridine; tmen = N,N,N′N′-tetramethylethylenediamine; Me2en = N,N-dimethylethylenediamine; dmg = dimethylglyoxime; terpy = N,N′,N″-terpyridine; Et3en = N,N,N′-triethylethylenediamine; mtz = 4-methylthiazole. b Cu–Cl(bridge)–Cu bond angle. c trans L–Cu–Cl(bridge) bond angle. d trans L–Cu–Cl(terminal) bond angle. e The data refers to the di-μ-chloro bridge, which is not involved in the chain formation, the J-value being a lower estimate for the interaction (see text).

[Cu(Me2en)Cl2]2 −2.2 86.1 167.7 173.6 2.73 3.46 31.5 4g

[Cu4(hat)2Cl8]n +0.7 90.3 171.0 164.5 2.66 3.52 33.9 17

a tmso = tetramethylene sulfoxide; 2-MePy = 2-methylpyridine; tmen = N,N,N′N′-tetramethylethylenediamine; Me2en = N,N-dimethylethylenediamine; dmg = dimethylglyoxime; terpy = N,N′,N″-terpyridine; Et3en = N,N,N′-triethylethylenediamine; mtz = 4-methylthiazole.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 1 The dinuclear complex [Cu2(dpp)(H2O)(dmso)Cl4] in 1a. Thermal ellipsoids are plotted at the 50% probability level.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 1  The dinuclear complex [Cu2(dpp)(H2O)(dmso)Cl4] in 1a. Thermal ellipsoids are plotted at the 50% probability level.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 2 Stack of dinuclear units in 1a. The shortest intermolecular Cu⋯Cl contacts are indicated (Cu(1)⋯Cl(3a) = 3.767(1) Å). Symmetry operations: (a) 1 − x, −y, −z; (b) 1 − x, 1 − y, −z.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 2  Stack of dinuclear units in 1a. The shortest intermolecular Cu⋯Cl contacts are indicated (Cu(1)⋯Cl(3a) = 3.767(1) Å). Symmetry operations: (a) 1 - x, -y, -z; (b) 1 - x, 1 - y, -z.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 3 Section of the [Cu2(dpp)Cl4]n chain in 2. Thermal ellipsoids are plotted at the 30% probability level. Symmetry operations: (a) x, −y + 1/2, z − 1/2; (b) x, −y + 1/2, z + 1/2.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 3  Section of the [Cu2(dpp)Cl4]n chain in 2. Thermal ellipsoids are plotted at the 30% probability level. Symmetry operations: (a) x, -y + 1/2, z - 1/2; (b) x, -y + 1/2, z + 1/2.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 4 Connection of [Cu2(dpp)Cl4]n chains into sheets.
cln_elements.clean_text: Fig. 4  Connection of [Cu2(dpp)Cl4]n chains into sheets.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 5 χ M T versus T plot for complex 1a (○) and 2 (△). The solid lines are the best fit to the data (see text).
